verses.name: 2 Chronicles 2:8
verses.text: Send me also cedar trees, fir trees, and algum trees, out of Lebanon: for I know that thy servants can skill to cut timber in Lebanon; and, behold, my servants shall be with thy servants,

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 2:9
verses.text: Even to prepare me timber in abundance: for the house which I am about to build shall be wonderful great.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 2:10
verses.text: And, behold, I will give to thy servants, the hewers that cut timber, twenty thousand measures of beaten wheat, and twenty thousand measures of barley, and twenty thousand baths of wine, and twenty thousand baths of oil.
